alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 11:33PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR FRONTIER COUNTY... At 1132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Curtis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Curtis, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Quick, Orafino, Bluegill Haven Campground, Willow View Campground, Freedom, Red Willow Reservoir State Recreation Area and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 44. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
